content.rendered:
PRIVACY Policy

How we treat personal information when Our customers use Dialer360 products and Service.

 

Information Collection

This website is responsible for all the information it may collect from you. We collect your information when you register with us for buying our product. The information we collect from you in general is, your name, email ID, residential address, Phone No, Payment Card details etc. We may collect third party information from you if needed. Like for some of our products, we may require information of your agents such as their names in order to add those agents in the system. However if you provide the information about another person, you confirm that you have their consent to the processing of their personal information by us and that you have informed them about our identity and the purpose for which their personal data will be processed.

COLLECTED INFORMATION USAGE

We use the information that we collected from you for the following purposes:

  • In order to process your payment and to provide you with products or services that you have requested from us.
  • To respond to your enquiries and requests so that we may provide you with first rate services.
  • To notify you about special offers on our products and services that may be of interest to you.
  • In order to enable you to register with us.
  • To know the interests of the site visitors so that we can continuously improve our website services.

DO WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION WITH THIRD PARTY?

We guarantee that we do not share your information with any third party. All the information that you provide us will always be kept secure and safe as our first priority. We will be responsible for all the information that you provided at registration time or that you provided when contacting us. However we may use Google Analytics in order to observe our site traffic and make our site better (according to visitor’s preferences) but we will only share the cookies with Google Analytics. Your personal information recorded by us will not be shared by Google Analytics. So other than sharing our visitors’ cookies with Google Analytics, we ensure you that we will never share your information with any third party.

SECURITY OF YOUR COLLECTED INFORMATION

Our website and our products ensure the security of your collected information by us. Our products use PCI Compliance to guarantee your financial information security. And our website uses Privacy Policy Act as a testimony in order to ensure your collected data information security. So, we hereby declare the 100% security of your personal information from any third party.

COOKIES

We use cookies on this website. A cookie is a text file sent by a web server to a web browser and then stored by the web browser. The text file is then sent back to the server each time the browser requests a page from the server. This helps the web server to identify and track the web browser. Cookies are generally divided into two categories:

  • First Party Cookie
  • Third Party Cookie

First party cookies are such cookies that are handled by the administrator himself/herself. Administrator himself/herself observes the traffic of his/her site. While third party cookies are handled by a service provider to help administrator to analyze his/her website traffic. We are using third party cookies as we are taking services of Google Analytics. Google Analytics helps its users to analyze their website traffic so that they can observe visitors’ preferences and improve their website.

Cookies may contain information like your visits to this website such as your IP address, geographical location, browser type, referral source, length of visit and number of page views. We may use this information in the administration of this website, to improve the website usability according to the tastes of visitors.

LINK OF OTHER WEBSITES

We do not have any external link other than our own site pages on our website. We don’t have any third party involved with our site and products ownership. Our website is solely created for our products hence there isn’t any other site links.

OTHER DISCLOSURES

We declare that we are responsible for the privacy of your personal information and we will not disclose your personal information to any third party. But if there is any legal authority asking us to disclose your information for some legal action, only then we will ever disclose your information. If we are requested by law to disclose your information then we will abide by the law. But other than this, we ensure that your information will always be protected by us.

CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We reserve all the rights to make any necessary changes in this privacy policy at any time. You can come visit our site and read the changes and provide us with your feedback for us to know your consent with the privacy policy changes.

CONTACT DETAILS

If you have anything you want to ask about this privacy policy or our products then feel free to contact us by sending us an email at contact@dialer360.com or you can send us your message through our “Contact Us” form.
